comment_0: The mean to this song is don't judge a book by its color otherwise meaning if you don't know a place and your just looking at it from above go visit it talk to the people who know you might enjoy it I was born and raise California but I visited a small town in South Dakota and I loved it people were amazing and   Kind I moved there for a year and wanna go back and the people that farm they may look broke but if they have a good crop season well y'all would know they have money coming in and have extra beside of my experience with these people if you don't take a step out of your comfort zone you'll never know what other places are like.
